column5: Hello folks, I'm interested in purchasing a cheap 10 or 12 ft aluminum boat... I have a motor for it already, so that part is outta the way. Any ideas of where to look? I've been perusing kijiji, but there isn't a lot there. Anyone know of any local marinas who'd sell used ones? Any information is appreciated.
I am in Whitby... just to clarify what "local" means.

Well I guess it depends how much "cheap" you want to spend,small tinnies are always in demand for cottagers and camps and stuff so give us a price ?? I live in cottage country and see a fair amount of them for sale seems like they are around $500 is that about your price range??
Oops, forgot to mention a price... anywhere from $400-$700 I am willing to spend.
Bass Pro has cheap Tracker Jon boats for less than $700 new, PM me if you're thinking about this option and I can give you some pros and cons, I have one

12 footers are hard to buy,I have been trying to buy one for 6 months and ended up buying a 14ft.For starters ALL the boats in your price range LEAK.. and secondly those that have them want WAY to much for them!!!!   vance
I sent u a pm.  I have a 12ft that u can look at. Cartopper light rated for 7.5hp
Finesse Fan, you sent a pm? I seem to have not received it... weird... Resend it?
I sent it again hopefully u got it
